thread.section_title: Manchester United defender Phil Jones withdraws from England squad with injury – Metro
thread.title: Manchester United defender Phil Jones withdraws from England squad with injury
thread.title_full: Manchester United defender Phil Jones withdraws from England squad with injury

author: Sean Kearns
title: Manchester United defender Phil Jones withdraws from England squad with injury
text:
Phil Jones has pulled out of England’s squad to face Germany (Picture: Getty) Phil Jones has returned to Manchester United after withdrawing from England’s squad with injury.
The defender was recalled into Gareth Southgate’s squad after a resurgent campaign under Jose Mourinho this season.
Time for a reality check: Arsenal is as good as it's going to get for Mesut Ozil The 24-year-old sustained an injury in training and there’s no update on the severity of the knock.
As England are yet to travel to Germany for their freindly in Dortmund, Jones has returned immediately to United’s training base for treatment.
Squad update: @PhilJones4 has returned to @ManUtd after picking up an injury in today’s training session. https://t.co/v997Zj1Wja 
— England (@England) March 21, 2017 
The Red Devils face West Bromwich Albion on April 1st in their first game after the international break.
Southgate is yet to name a replacement for Jones.
MORE: Arsenal star Hector Bellerin admits he is flattered by Barcelona interest
